description.value:
Activate A Interact

When created, this mutagen is attuned to one of four energy types: acid, cold, electricity, or fire. When consumed, the mutagen suffuses your body with energy that spills out whenever you attack. At higher levels, it can even grant you the ability to unleash the energy in controlled bursts.

Benefit You gain resistance 15 to the attuned energy type. Whenever you score a hit with a melee weapon, add [[/r 1d6]] damage to the attuned energy type. In addition, you can end the benefits of this mutagen to unleash a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of energy that deals [[/r 2d6]] damage of the attuned type for every full 10 minutes of duration remaining (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true|name:Greater Energy Mutagen] save).

Drawback You gain weakness 5 to the other three energy types.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater)]{Effect: Energy Mutagen (Greater)}

source.value: Pathfinder Adventure: The Fall of Plaguestone
